About

I graduated cum laude from the wonderful Bowdoin College in 2017 with a B.A. in Computer Science and have been living and working in the San Francisco Bay Area since then.

Projects

While at Bowdoin, I completed a senior honors thesis investigating the year-over-year impact of various environmental and economic variables on global crop yields using genetics-based machine learning (GBML) techniques. You can find this work on GitHub. My thesis advisor was Clare Bates Congdon. My major advisor was Stephen Majercik.

Contact

Some years ago, I realized that social media was not adding enough value to my life to compensate for the distraction it proved to be, so you will not find me there. I can be reached via email at wgantt@gmail.com.
